description:
This presentation was recorded at GOTO Accelerate 2016
https://gotocon.com/accelerate-2016

Simon Wardley - Researcher for The Leading Edge Forum; At the Intersection of IT Strategy & New Technology

ABSTRACT
We live in a competitive world. That competition forces change. It has always forced change. Change is normal.
The question is not whether our organizations will change [...]

Download slides and read the full abstract here:
https://gotocon.com/accelerate-2016/presentations/show_talk.jsp?oid=7941

title: GOTO 2016 • Situation Normal, Everything Must Change • Simon Wardley
